title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Aptos (APT) Gains 7.5%, as Index Rises From Monday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: NEAR Protocol (NEAR) was also a top performer, gaining 6.7%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2525.03, up 3.6% (+87.07) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Eighteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: APT (+7.5%) and NEAR (+6.7%).

Laggards: BCH (-2.6%) and AAVE (-2.0%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index rose 3.6% with 18 of 20 assets trading higher, indicating broad market gains and positive momentum.
